title: Sampler, 1851
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in buttonhole, cross, chain, satin, knot, and running stitches on plain weave foundation with withdrawn element work and needle lace.
description: White work square with decorative hemstitching.  Four inset squares of hollie point and eight placket cuts along the edges.  In the center initials and date.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1851.
1851. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in buttonhole, cross, chain, satin, knot, and running stitches on plain weave foundation with withdrawn element work and needle lace.. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-191.
